testcase.classname: User could register with valid data
testcase.name: register a new account
testcase.system-out: Given user open the browser and website.....................................passed And user navigate to register page..........................................passed When select gender, fill firstname and lastname.............................passed And choose birthdate day, month, year.......................................passed And insert email, password and confirm password.............................passed And click on register button................................................passed Then successful register message appears....................................passed

testcase.classname: User log in with valid email and password
testcase.name: login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user open browser.....................................................passed And user navigate to login page.............................................passed When user enter valid email and password....................................passed Then user click on login button.............................................passed

testcase.name: switch between US Dollar and Euro
testcase.system-out: Given Open browser, and website.............................................passed When click on currency drop-list and choose Euro............................passed Then click on currency drop-list and choose US Dollar.......................passed

testcase.name: select categorise
testcase.system-out: Given open browser, website.................................................passed When click on selected categorise...........................................passed Then selected categorise page will open.....................................passed

testcase.name: select specific categorise
testcase.system-out: Given open browser and the website..........................................passed When hover on Apparel and click on Shoes....................................passed Then filter by color........................................................passed

testcase.classname: User select different tags in product page
testcase.name: select different tags in categorise page
testcase.system-out: Given open the browser then website.........................................passed When click on selected categorise "Digital downloads".......................passed Then click on "awesome" tag.................................................passed

testcase.classname: User add different products to Shopping cart
testcase.name: add product to cart
testcase.system-out: Given Open browser and website..............................................passed When clicking on selected categorise........................................passed And clicking on selected product............................................passed Then click on add to cart to selected product...............................passed

testcase.classname: User add different products to Wishlist
testcase.name: add product to wishlist
testcase.system-out: Given Open browser and the website..........................................passed When click on chosen categorise.............................................passed And click on chosen product.................................................passed Then click on add to wishlist icon to selected product......................passed

testcase.classname: User add different products to compare list
testcase.name: add product to compare list
testcase.system-out: Given Open browser and website.............................................passed When click on specific categorise...........................................passed And click on specific product...............................................passed Then click on add to compare list icon to selected product..................passed

testcase.name: create a successful Order
testcase.system-out: Given opening browser and website...........................................passed When choose and click on selected categorise................................passed And choose and click on selected product....................................passed And choose and click on add to cart to selected product.....................passed And click on shopping cart upper page.......................................passed And click on checkbox to agree terms........................................passed Then click on checkout button...............................................passed
